content.2: Thinkest thou this to be right,
content.3: For thou saidst, What advantage will it be unto thee?
content.4: I will answer thee, and thy companions with thee.
content.5: Look unto the heavens, and see; and behold the clouds
content.6: If thou sinnest, what doest thou against him? or
content.7: If thou be righteous, what givest thou him? or what receiveth he of thine hand?
content.9: By reason of the multitude of oppressions they make
content.11: Who teacheth us more than the beasts of the earth, and maketh us wiser than the fowls of heaven?
content.12: There they cry, but none giveth answer, because of the pride of evil men.
content.13: Surely God will not hear vanity, neither will the Almighty regard it.
content.14: Although thou sayest thou shalt not see him,
content.16: Therefore doth Job open his mouth in vain; he multiplieth words without knowledge.
